title: Best of the Program | Guest: Ian Prior | 10/6/22
description:
Stu gives another midterm update and what the newest percentages are saying. Glenn reviews his latest special, where he outlines a decades-old plan to destroy America and where America is currently in that plan. Senior strategist for Citizens for Sanity Ian Prior joins to discuss the viral campaign ads cleverly criticizing the Left’s insane ideology.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
